footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Cyno | Update Date: 10/26/2022 | Editor: Luanjo#5886

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Cyno benefits from teammates who have **lower field time requirements—as to not compete with his own**; and abilities that have some sort of **off-field presence**, whether it be Damage, Energy Particles generation or added utility like Healing/Resistance to Interruption. 

He has synergy with a plethora of **Electro flexes**. Examples being: **Fischl**, **Kuki**, **Beidou**, **Yae**, and **Dori**.

Dendro being a novelty means **Dendro flexes** are scarce. Thankfully, between the characters readily available, Cyno is able to synergize with both the **Dendro Traveler** and **Collei**, which are **free units**.

**Hydro flexes** include **Xingqiu**, **Yelan**, **Kokomi** and **Barbara**.

**Anemo flexes** can be picked up for their Grouping/Buffing/Healing capabilities—**Kazuha**, **Sucrose**, **Heizou**, **Sayu**, **Jean**, **Anemo Traveler**.
